functionDecorators.name: getCdaiCollateralFactor
functionDecorators.description: Gets the collateral factor from Compound for cDai Given an input amount of vdai, return the corresponding cdai.

functionDecorators.name: rebalance
functionDecorators.description: Rebalances the assets Only executes if the current borrow ratio is below the minimum borrow ratio or above the target borrow ratio After the rebalance, the borrow ratio should be equal to the target borrow ratio.

parameterDecorators.name: _minBorrowRatio
parameterDecorators.description: the minimum ratio to be borrowed between 0 to 1.

parameterDecorators.name: _targetBorrowRatio
parameterDecorators.description: the target ratio to be borrowed between 0 to 1.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxBorrowRatio
parameterDecorators.description: the maximum ratio to be borrowed between 0 to 1.

parameterDecorators.name: _minimumDaiIncrease
parameterDecorators.description: is the minimum amount of DAI to get in exchange for COMP tokens.
